name: Freefall (itch) (xeno_ant, Freezch)
description:
The Ball is stuck in a TRUCK! Its driving without driver and fallls of a Cliff. You have to help the Ball trough a Maze of Containers, Traps and more. You can Build Stuff and rotate the whole truck in midair. There are Metal Pieces flying around and the Ball wants out of the Container, out of the pure Chaos. Complete all three Levels and win against the Chaos! 

To Play the Game in with the best experience, Press on the BLUE Fullscreenbutton in the Browser or Download the GameFiles.
